scripts.mangle-for-local:md2html: github-markdown README.md -h -s docs/styles/github.css > readme.html & github-markdown docs/glossary.md -h -s styles/github.css > docs/glossary.html & github-markdown docs/identity.md -h -s styles/github.css > docs/identity.html & github-markdown docs/remuneration-api.md -h -s styles/github.css > docs/remuneration-api.html & github-markdown docs/lookup.md -h -s styles/github.css > docs/lookup.html  & github-markdown docs/delegation-subletting.md -h -s styles/github.css > docs/delegation-subletting.html  & github-markdown docs/secrets-keybiner.md -h -s styles/github.css > docs/secrets-keybiner.html & github-markdown docs/decentralization.md -h -s styles/github.css > docs/decentralization.html & github-markdown docs/trustlessness.md -h -s styles/github.css > docs/trustlessness.html & github-markdown docs/overhide.js.md -h -s styles/github.css > docs/overhide.js.html  & github-markdown docs/state-funnel.md -h -s styles/github.css > docs/state-funnel.html
scripts.mangle-for-local:github2local: npm run mangle-for-local:github2local1 & npm run mangle-for-local:github2local2 & npm run mangle-for-local:github2local3
scripts.mangle-for-local:link-md2html2: npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html2-1 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html2-2 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html2-3
scripts.mangle-for-local:link-md2html: npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html1 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html2 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html3 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html4  & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html5  & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html6  & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html7 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html8 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html9 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html10 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html11 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html12 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html13 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html14 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html15 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html16 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html17 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html18 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html19 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html20 & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html21
scripts.mangle-for-local: npm run mangle-for-local:md2html & npm run mangle-for-local:github2local & npm run mangle-for-local:link-md2html
scripts.mangle-for-local:after-pack: npm run mangle-for-local:after-pack1 & npm run mangle-for-local:after-pack2 & npm run mangle-for-local:after-pack3
scripts.all-for-local-html: npm run build:broker & npm run build:remuneration & npm run mangle-for-local & npm run pack:broker & npm run pack:remuneration & npm run mangle-for-local:after-pack
scripts.all-for-github: npm run build:broker & npm run build:remuneration & npm run pack:broker & npm run pack:remuneration
